duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee day-to-day administrative operations of multiple office locations, ensuring smooth workflow and efficient file and document management.
Lead onboarding and offboarding processes, including recruitment efforts and implementing company policies and compliance guidelines.
Manage accounts payable and receivable functions, collaborating with accounting for financial transactions and record-keeping.
Supervise and mentor administrative staff, providing guidance, training, and performance evaluations.
Handle maintenance of office facilities, act as the point of contact for external parties, and ensure compliance and reporting across all office locations.
Collaborate on special projects, process improvements, technology implementations, and office relocations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Management, or related field
